name: Montavo
overview:
The Montavo technology closes the loop and correlates consumers who view digital and or TV ads and the subset of those consumers who then purchased products & or services in a bricks-&-mortar store, providing the advertiser with sales revenue and profits (Mfg.’s & retailers from global brands to SMB’s).

Montavo Inc. is a US based company and is deploying an advanced marketing & advertising technology solution. The Montavo ad platform offers advertisers the unique opportunity to review a “ad spend to gross profit” ratio gauge (the Ad Spendometer) which generates and displays a Return-on-Investment report of their brick-&-mortar stores (not just their on-line store) sales revenue & profits specifically attributed & correlated to their advertising costs (smart phones, tables, lap tops, & TV). This means advertisers know in real-time for every dollar they spend in advertising on the Montavo ad platform (or any ad platform that has added the Montavo advertising technology & Ad Spendometer logo to their solution), how many dollars came back including brick-&-mortar store sales revenue & profits specifically related to their ad spend.
